name: Quadruped
summary: You were crafted in a form with four legs rather than two.
description:
You were crafted in a form with four legs rather than two. Your Speed is 30 feet.

Special You can take this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain into or out of this feat.Traits

Poppet: Small constructs originally designed to serve as companions or servants. They occasionally gain a greater spark of life, transforming them into independent, sapient creatures.
